job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong><strong>Data Scientist</strong></strong> </p><p>tl;dr: An innovative seed-stage startup in the DevSecOps space is looking for a Data Scientist to join our team and help design and build NLP and anomaly detection models and algorithms using bleeding edge technology. </p><p><br> </p><strong><strong>Our tech-stack and R&amp;D culture</strong></strong><p>As this is a greenfield application, we do not have all the details ironed out, <em>you</em>&nbsp;will help us do that. However, we’ll probably be using some of these: </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong>Databricks / Apache Spark / Presto / Hive / Athena </strong>for data wrangling </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong>PyTorch / TensorFlow / Keras / Scikit-learn </strong>for ML/DL </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong>AWS</strong>&nbsp;as a cloud provider </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong>Python and Jupyter notebooks </strong>well, for everything </p><p><br> </p><p>We will be putting a high emphasis on: </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Honing your skills </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Non-blocking automatic MLOps CI/CD pipeline </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Letting data scientists research and not distract them with endless unneeded meetings </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Involvement and impact on the decision making process and roadmap of a new product </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Open-source use and contribution </p><p><br> </p><p>One of the challenges of data scientists is getting data, you’ll have all the data you need, and then some. </p><strong>&nbsp;</strong><p><strong><strong>What do we expect you to bring to the table?</strong></strong><p>We believe that for every highly functioning relationship, there must be a good synergy between the partners and that it must be a win-win situation for all. </p><p>Our key requirements are: </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Enjoy your work and working with your team and be proud of it </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Assume best intentions – we know we will! </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Drive to build something amazing </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Be excited about data and coding </p><p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Have strong opinions, but hold them loosely </p><p>&nbsp; </p><strong><strong>What will you be doing?</strong></strong><p>As a seed-stage team member, you will be working on a greenfield application and ML models. You will be an integral part of the design and architecture decision process, working directly with the other team members and leadership (we have a very flat structure). In this role you will have a huge impact on the success of the company. </p><br><p><strong>Minimum&nbsp;Qualifications </strong><strong><br></strong> </p><p>- At least 4 years of experience as a Data Scientist / Researcher / ML Engineer </p><p>- Hands-on experience building ML/DL&nbsp;models&nbsp;<br> </p><p>- Master's degree or equivalent in a STEM field&nbsp;<br> </p><p><br> </p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications</strong> </p><p>- MLOps and data engineering experience<br> </p><p>- Familiarity with the DevOps ecosysetm </p><p>- Experience with NLP, anomaliy detetion<br> </p><p>- PhD in a STEM field&nbsp;</p></p>
